description: Lists timeline events for the specified incident record.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Filters the timeline events based on the provided conditional values. You can filter timeline events with the following keys: eventReference eventTime eventType Note the following when deciding how to use Filters: If you don't specify a Filter, the response includes all timeline events. If you specify more than one filter in a single request, the response returns timeline events that match all filters. If you specify a filter with more than one value, the response returns timeline events that match any of the values provided. (dict) --- Filter the selection by using a condition. The condition accepts before or after a specified time, equal to a string, or equal to an integer. after (datetime) --- After the specified timestamp. before (datetime) --- Before the specified timestamp equals (dict) --- The value is equal to the provided string or integer. integerValues (list) --- The list of integer values that the filter matches. (integer) --- stringValues (list) --- The list of string values that the filter matches. (string) --- The key that you're filtering on.

parameters.name: incidentRecordArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the incident that includes the timeline event.

nested_items.name: eventSummaries
nested_items.description: Details about each event that occurred during the incident.

nested_items.name: eventReferences
nested_items.description: A list of references in a TimelineEvent.

nested_items.name: relatedItemId
nested_items.description: The ID of a RelatedItem referenced in a TimelineEvent.

nested_items.name: resource
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon Web Services resource referenced in a TimelineEvent.

nested_items.name: eventTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the event occurred.

nested_items.name: eventType
nested_items.description: The type of event. The timeline event must be Custom Event or Note.

nested_items.name: eventUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the timeline event was last updated.

nested_items.name: incidentRecordArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the incident that the event happened during.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use when requesting the next set of items. If there are no additional items to return, the string is null.
